keyword: how many calories in a ny strip steak
title: How Many Calories in a NY Strip Steak?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a NY strip steak, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per serving, and preparation tweaks.
h1: How Many Calories in a NY Strip Steak?
assumptions: 8 oz (227 g) cooked, choice grade, boneless, trimmed of visible fat, broiled or grilled, no added sauces or seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, grade, cooking method, fat trimming, and portion size. Check labels or USDA data for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A typical 8 oz NY strip steak provides ~568 kcal and ~61 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a NY strip steak per ounce?
faqs.a: About 71 kcal per ounce for an 8 oz cooked steak.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a NY strip steak?
faqs.a: Approximately 61 g protein in an 8 oz serving.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in NY strip steak?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”grilling or broiling keeps it lower; frying adds oil and calories.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a NY strip steak?
faqs.a: Around 34 g total fat, including 14 g saturated, in an 8 oz trimmed steak.

faqs.q: Are NY strip steaks high in cholesterol?
faqs.a: Yes, about 193 mg in an 8 oz serving, mostly from the meat itself.
